      • addPositionObserver

        public void addPositionObserver(java.util.Observer o)
        Add an Observer to the list of GPS observers. This Observer's update method will be passed a PositionList object as the argument. This must be called before the simulation is started!
        Parameters:
        o -

      • start

        public void start()
        Begins executing a simulation. This call will block until the simulation completes.
